Creates a new WriteBinaryData object.

Parameters:
pout - PipedOutputStream to write the data
values - values to be written
signalPosition - position of the first signal
template - row template as a bytebuffer
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Execution thread to write the data in binary. A DataOutputStream is created on the given PipedOutputStream to write binary. Actual data values are inserted in the row template for faster insertion.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
